channel.title: ChaosScape 317 Server Development
channel.description:
Since our founder can no longer support this project and Mod Pat and I have time to actually get it off the ground, we will! Previous Post: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,444626.0.html
Owner/Founder: Mod Carter(EwfsPrince) Lead Server/Client Developer: Mod Siver(xxx123xxx) Server/Lead Content Developer: Mod Pat(Priv Serv Man) Web Developers: Mod Thomas(I Vain I)If still interested Developers that are welcome back Mod Adam Mod John(jmood128 ) X Vain X Some other ones that I forgot
Skills Finished In Progress No Progress
[ul][li]Agility[/li] [li]Cooking[/li] [li]Crafting[/li] [li]Farming[/li] [li]Fire Making[/li] [li]Fishing[/li] [li]Fletching[/li] [li]Herblore[/li] [li]Mining[/li] [li]Prayer[/li] [li]RuneCrafting[/li] [li]Slayer[/li] [li]Smithing[/li] [li]Thieiving[/li] [li]Woodcutting[/li][/ul]
Combat
[ul][li]Melee[/li] [li]Magic[/li] [li]Range[/li][/ul]
Melee
[ul][li]Millisecond Timing[/li] [li]Weapon Specials[/li] [li]Double hit[/li] [li]Block Animations[/li] [li]Correct Attack Animations[/li][/ul]
Media
Video: Last updated Combat before I had exams http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oLxoAzBd6JQ Special's test. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KoMpCjCDUUU
Photos: [IMG]http://i236.photobucket.com/albums/ff106/xxx123xxx_2007/woodcutting.png[/img] [IMG]http://i236.photobucket.com/albums/ff106/xxx123xxx_2007/mining.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i236.photobucket.com/albums/ff106/xxx123xxx_2007/fletching.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i236.photobucket.com/albums/ff106/xxx123xxx_2007/agility.jpg[/img]
Updates: 1/15/2010 Agility has been started on and almost completed - Mod Pat Agility has been completed - Mod Pat
We will start accepting applications once the post has been made and approved by a mod.
Still working on this, accidentally hit post -.-
